description:
Yuma faces his toughest test to date when he challenges the tomato loving Tombo to a duel!  Can Yuma overcome his hate for tomatoes and be victorious, or will his taste buds only be serving up defeat?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuma`s Greatest Ordeal! Fight to Death, Vegetable Death Match
Yuuma Saidai no Shiren! Shitou, Yasai Death Match
遊馬最大の試練! 死闘, 野菜デスマッチ
